value.title: Use Power BI Web From Example over multiple URLs
value.excerpt: Wil Reynolds asked an awesome question about how to use multiple URLs with the web from example Power BI feature. The magic is with Power Query functions and parameters. Patrick has you covered!  ******** LET'S CONNECT! ********  -- http://twitter.com/guyinacube -- http://twitter.com/awsaxton -- http://twitter.com/patrickdba

value.title: Using Single Sign-on with the Power BI Gateway
value.excerpt: Let's dig into the Power BI gateway and Single Sign-On (SSO) using Kerberos!  This can be used for both DirectQuery and refreshing a Power BI dataset. value.title: What is a Power BI tenant? (Office 365 / Azure Active Directory)
value.excerpt: In this video, Adam looks at what a Power BI tenant is. This is really the Azure Active Directory / Office 365 tenant that contains your users, groups, subscriptions and more. value.title: What the heck are BUILD PERMISSIONS in Power BI?!?
